6e0e3716-2bf3-4e91-9ac2-76c9e8d07548.name: Choose four
6e0e3716-2bf3-4e91-9ac2-76c9e8d07548.notes: Or three, and raise a primary skill by a level.

da79d240-de29-400c-a0fd-b390efc827ba.name: Judo
da79d240-de29-400c-a0fd-b390efc827ba.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

290772da-9ff9-4ef8-b5e0-7bba2ca8c6ab.name: Choose seven
290772da-9ff9-4ef8-b5e0-7bba2ca8c6ab.notes: Or six, and either raise one by a level, or buy another primary skill.

1b335d5a-dfd2-4d2b-998e-3f8bfc5138ac.name: Choose 18 points
1b335d5a-dfd2-4d2b-998e-3f8bfc5138ac.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

df4514d5-4203-4310-b350-2f7e309ecf7b.name: Intelligence
df4514d5-4203-4310-b350-2f7e309ecf7b.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

58970994-0d96-47a1-949e-4b7add9ef1ac.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

9b93dd15-94f6-40e0-8124-93b9ce2cdb78.name: Choose 18 points
9b93dd15-94f6-40e0-8124-93b9ce2cdb78.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

1ab3894a-a29d-4577-8d36-d7585a10c9ac.name: Security
1ab3894a-a29d-4577-8d36-d7585a10c9ac.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.
